doc:
Steven Anthony Lawrence https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steven_Anthony_Lawrence 0 Steven Anthony Lawrence (born July 19, 1990) is an American actor. He is best known for his recurring role as Bernard "Beans" Aranguren in the hit Disney Channel Original Series Even Stevens from 2001 to 2003. Steven_Anthony_Lawrence ( born July_19_,_1990 ) is an_American_actor . He is_best_known for his_recurring_role as Bernard_"_Beans_"_Aranguren in the_hit_Disney_Channel_Original_Series_Even_Stevens from 2001 to 2003 .
